messages.title: Islington Labour is on your side.
messages.content: The General Election on 8th June is a clear choice between a Labour Party who will stand up for you or the Tories who are failing working people.

messages.title: A Labour Government will make a difference for you by:
messages.content:
Building over a million new homes in 5 years, including over 500,000 council homes, and taking tough action to help private renters.
Introducing a real living wage of £10 per hour, making work pay and banning exploitative zero hour contracts.
Giving our NHS the funding it needs and tackling the crisis in social care to ensure it is there for those who need it.
Building a new National Education Service, Restoring free education for all; and guaranteeing quality apprenticeships and adult skills training.
Maintaining access to the single market, guaranteeing EU citizens’ rights and protecting the workers’ rights, local funding and environmental safeguards we get from Europe.

community.content: Building over a million new homes in 5 years, including over 500,000 council homes, and taking tough action to help private renters.

leaflet.personalStatement: Through my local office I deal with the impact of the Tories’ failures; a lack of decent homes, an NHS in crisis and rising wealth inequality. We can’t take another five years of Tory rule. We need a Labour government who will make fairer choices for everyone in Islington.

examples: Building over a million new homes in 5 years
Introducing a real living wage of £10 per hour
Taking tough action to help private renters
Under my leadership, Labour will deliver a better, fairer Britain where inequality is reduced, where public services are protected and the next generation have the best start in life.
Giving our NHS the funding it needs and tackling the crisis in social care to ensure it is there for those who need it.
Maintaining access to the single market, guaranteeing EU citizens’ rights and protecting the workers’ rights, local funding and environmental safeguards we get from Europe.
Restoring free education for all; and guaranteeing quality apprenticeships and adult skills training.
We can’t take another five years of Tory rule.
Through my local office I deal with the impact of the Tories’ failures; a lack of decent homes, an NHS in crisis and rising wealth inequality.
